CustomField.description: SEI =(SEM/(min(MV,AP)) -(P/LMV) ) SEM = Shared Equity Money MV – Market value of the property AP – Initial Acquisition Price P – Amount to be paid by the applicant . Captured from the Annual Review or Windfall gain notification LMV – Higher of AP or Market Value of the property (from VGV valuations)
CustomField.label: Shared Equity Interest
